name: 31 Nights
description:
NOTE: ONLY LEVEL 1 WORKS. ALSO, I DID TAKE AN EXTRA 45 MINUTES TO FIX SOME FATAL ERRORS. MY APOLOGIES. THERE'S ALSO A FEW BUGS THAT NEED MAINTENANCE.

I promise to work more on this game and add the remaining 30 Levels. Stay tuned. The 6 hours was a real challenge, but look forward to more content. Expect animations, Spells,  and Items!

Get ready for 31 Nights of terror. Fight across 31 levels of Monster battles and survive to the last day. Beware, you have 5 lives. If they run out, you must wait 5 minutes (300 seconds) to play again.
